headline.main: MORE ITALIAN LOSSES IN ADRIATIC REPORTED; Three Ships Were Destroyed by Submarine, Fishermen Say

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, Jan. 2 -- Unconfirmed reports from fishermen at Ulcen, on the Adriatic, late today described the sinking of three more Italian merchantmen by a submarine. The fishermen told the authorities how the merchantmen had been attacked Tuesday at dusk outside coastal waters northwest of Ulcen.
abstract: Belgrade sources rept 3 Ital merchant ships in Adriatic sunk by unidentified submarine
